package.name: Simply_Smooth
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
This was originally the Smooth Operator message style, but there were some things about it that author personally didn't like, so he took it into his own hands.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=3892
